task.title: How do I save a picture of a shared screen?
task.shortdesc: During an Instant Share session, you can take a snap shot of the shared portion of someone else's screen and save it to a location of your choice.

taskbody.context:
You specify the location to save the snap shot in the HCL Sametime Connect or Notes preferences.
Options
If you are using: Do this:
HCL Sametime Connect
Click
Actions and preferences
Preferences . Then, click Instant Share and specify the location.
HCL Notes
Click
Actions and preferences
Preferences and expand the Sametime section in the navigator. Then, click Instant Share and specify the location.

step.cmd: After accepting an invitation to participate in an Instant Share session, the shared portion of the screen shows in a window. Click the Snap Shot icon in the shared screen window to take a copy or snap shot of the shared screen.
Click OK to save the snap shot to the location you specified.
